items: Is a configuration file (e.g., .prettierrc, .clang-format) present in the root directory?
Does the formatter run automatically on file save in the IDE?
Is there a pre-commit hook to ensure all staged files are formatted?
Is the line width standardized (e.g., 80 or 120 characters) across the project?
Are indentation rules (spaces vs. tabs) consistent and enforced?
Does the CI pipeline fail if code is not properly formatted?
